long_description: Combining style and glare-reducing polarized lenses, the Pepper's A-Train Polarized Sunglasses are sunny-day essentials at a great value. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement, for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. The Pepper's A-Train Polarized Sunglasses feature polarized green or polarized gray lenses. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Closeout.
short_description: Combining style and glare-reducing polarized lenses, the Pepper's A-Train Polarized Sunglasses are sunny-day essentials at a great value.
